browser_push.tooltip: Every user needs to give their browser permission to receive notifications.

schedule_changed.description: When you use the Notify employees feature in Schedules, the selected employees get a notification. <0>Learn more</0>
schedule_changed.title: Change schedules

scheduling_period.description: When the schedule has been published, employees receive a notification. <0>Learn more</0>
scheduling_period.title: Publish schedules

shift_trading.description: When an employee selects another employee to swap shifts, the second employee receives a notification. <0>Learn more</0>
shift_trading.title: Shift swap
